ITEM.TEXT: Catégorie pour les objets à traiter

Catégorie pour les informations de Run
Catégorie pour les informations de Run

LOCAL.TYPES: ` *"* use this source file for any type declarations (class *"* definitions, interfaces or data types) you need for method *"* implementation or private method's signature
LOCAL.IMPLEMENTATIONS: ` *"* local class implementation for public class *"* use this source file for the implementation part of *"* local helper classes

ITEM.SOURCE:
` ********************************************************************** * Author : Al'oustad Taryck BENSIALI (taryck.bensiali@gmail.com) * * Date : 2008 December * ********************************************************************** data _cat like LINE OF x_categ.
_cat-sign = 'I'. _cat-Option = 'EQ'. _cat-low = DATA_BLOC. APPEND _cat to x_categ. " Data : bloc _cat-low = RUN_INFO. APPEND _cat to x_categ. " Information Run _cat-low = OBJ_CONF. APPEND _cat to x_categ. " confirmation d'objet
SELECT CATEG INTO TABLE _list FROM YGPL_RUN_CAT.

` ********************************************************************** * Author : Al'oustad Taryck BENSIALI (taryck.bensiali@gmail.com) * * Date : 2008 December * ********************************************************************** READ TABLE _list WITH TABLE KEY key = key TRANSPORTING NO FIELDS. IF sy-subrc = 0. exists = abap_true. ENDIF.

TYPES.ITEM: BEGIN OF ts_key, key TYPE _categ, END OF ts_key `
tt_keys TYPE HASHED TABLE OF ts_key WITH UNIQUE KEY KEY `
